updated_cases.title: Verify that HTTP headers specified in the forward to proxy profile(all checked) will be included in the CONNECT request forwarded to proxy server for SSL DND + RTP policy match
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create Forward to proxy profile with X-Forwarded-For, X-Authenticated-User and Tenant-Info checked
2. Configure a SSL DND policy 
3. Create RTP policy with the "Forward to Proxy" action
4. Generate traffic that matches the SSL DND and RTP policy
5. Verify that the connect request generated on proxy includes all the selected header
6. Verify the request is forwarded to proxy
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic is matched with SSL DND and RTP policy
Proxy logs should contain matching policy and connect logs has all selected header
Traffic is forwaded to proxy server

updated_cases.title: Verify that HTTP headers specified in the forward to proxy profile (one header checked) are included in the CONNECT request forwarded to proxy server for SSL DND + RTP policy match
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create Forward to proxy profile with X-NS-EXT-TENANT-ID checked
2. Configure a SSL DND policy 
3. Create RTP policy with the "Forward to Proxy" action
4. Send traffic that matches the SSL DND and RTP policy
5. Verify that the connect request generated on proxy includes just X-NS-EXT-TENANT-ID header
6. Verify the traffic is forwarded to forward to proxy
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic is matched with SSL DND and RTP policy
Proxy logs should contain matching policy and connect logs has selected header
Traffic is forwaded to proxy server

updated_cases.title: Verify that X-Forwarded-For header is the user ip in connect request forwarded to proxy for SSL DND + RTP policy is matched
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create Forward to proxy profile with all header checked
2. Configure a SSL DND policy 
3. Create RTP policy with the "Forward to Proxy" action
4. Send traffic that matches the SSL DND and RTP policy
5. Verify that in the connect request X-Forwarded-For header is user ip
6. Verify the traffic is forwarded to forward to proxy
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic is matched with SSL DND and RTP policy
Proxy logs should contain matching policy and connect requests has X-Forwarded-For header with user-ip
Traffic is forwaded to proxy server

updated_cases.title: Verify that X-Forwarded-For header is the user ip in connect request when SSL DECRYPT + RTP policy is matched
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create Forward to proxy profile with all header checked
2. Configure a SSL Decrypt policy 
3. Create RTP policy with the "Forward to Proxy" action
4. Send traffic that matches the SSL decrypt and RTP policy which doesn't have x-forwarded-for header
5. Verify that in the connect request X-Forwarded-For header is user ip
6. Verify the traffic is forwarded to forward to proxy
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic is matched with SSL DND and RTP policy
Proxy logs should contain matching policy and connect requests with user-ip in X-Forwarded-For
Traffic is forwarded is forwaded to proxy server

updated_cases.title: Verify that X-Forwarded-For header is appended with the user ip in connect request when SSL DECRYPT + RTP policy is matched
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create Forward to proxy profile with all header checked
2. Configure a SSL Decrypt policy 
3. Create RTP policy with the "Forward to Proxy" action
4. Send traffic that matches the SSL decrypt and RTP policy which has x-forwarded-for header
5. Verify that in the connect and encrypted request user ip is appended in X-Forwarded-For header
6. Verify the traffic is forwarded to forward to proxy
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic is matched with SSL DND and RTP policy
Proxy logs should contain matching policy and connect requests appends user-ip to X-Forwarded-For
Traffic is forwarded is forwaded to proxy server

updated_cases.title: Verify that X-Authenticated-User is user email in the connect request when SSL Decrypt + RTP policy is matched
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create Forward to proxy profile with all header checked
2. Configure a SSL Decrypt policy 
3. Create RTP policy with the "Forward to Proxy" action
4. Send traffic that matches the SSL decrypt and RTP policy
5. Verify that in the connect request X-Authenticated-User is user email
6. Verify the traffic is forwarded to forward to proxy
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic is matched with SSL Decrypt and RTP policy
Proxy logs should contain matching policy and connect requests contains user email  in X-Authenticated-User
Traffic is forwarded is forwaded to proxy server

updated_cases.title: Verify that X-Authenticated-User is overwritten with user email in the connect request when dummy email is sent in that header request with SSL Decrypt + RTP policy is matched
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create Forward to proxy profile with all header checked
2. Configure a SSL Decrypt policy 
3. Create RTP policy with the "Forward to Proxy" action
4. Send traffic that matches the SSL decrypt and RTP policy with dummy email in X-Authenticated-User
5. Verify that in the connect and encrypted request contains user email in  X-Authenticated-User
6. Verify the traffic is forwarded to forward to proxy
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Traffic is matched with SSL Decrypt and RTP policy
Proxy logs should contain matching policy and connect request contains user email in  X-Authenticated-User
Traffic is forwarded is forwaded to proxy server

updated_cases.title: Verify that the transaction event for SSL DND with a matched forward to proxy policy contains valid fields
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create SSL DND and RTP with forward to proxy policy 
2. Send traffic to match both the policy.
3. Verify below fields are populated with proper policy names
x-ssl-policy-action : DoNotDecrypt, 
x-ssl-policy-name : SSL DND policy
x-policy-name : Forward to proxy RTP policy
x-forward-dest : Forward proxy profile
updated_cases.custom_expected: Transaction event should contain matching policy and profile for SSL DND

updated_cases.title: Verify that the transaction event for SSL Decrypt with a matched forward to proxy policy contains valid fields
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Create SSL Decrypt and RTP with forward to proxy policy 
2. Send traffic to match both the policy.
3. Verify below fields are populated with proper policy names
x-ssl-policy-action : Decrypt??
x-ssl-policy-name : SSL Decrypt policy
x-policy-name : Forward to proxy RTP policy
x-forward-dest : Forward proxy profile
updated_cases.custom_expected: Transaction event should contain matching policy and profile for SSL Decrypt

updated_cases.title: Verify default feature flag value false for ssl dnd traffic with forward to proxy policy
